About.paragraph: Welcome to DevMeet, the social media platform for developers. At DevMeet, we believe that developers need a place to connect, collaborate, and learn from each other. That's why we've created a community where developers can meet, post, and ask technical and non-technical questions, and interact with each other

Contact.address: 1234 Cairo Univ st. Giza, Egypt, Giza 12345

Features.title: Post & Ask Questions
Features.text: Post your question on the platform and you will gladly get the help

Features.title: Interact and Comment
Features.text: You can help the others if you have the solution for thier issues

Features.title: Online Meetings
Features.text: Meet & Disscuss a lot of topics and negotiate with others using Zoom meetings

Features.title: Chatting
Features.text: Developers can be connected to each other in chat rooms

Features.title: Communities
Features.text: Collaborate with your community members and get new ideas
